data.name: Mirror 2: Project X - Cosplay Album
data.detailed_description:
6.23.2022 Added 36 photos.

This is the Cosplay Album for Mirror 2: Project X. Cosplayed by famous cosers in China.

We're still shooting more, the complete version will have at least 200 pictures.

Instructions:
This DLC will be automatically downloaded to the root folder of Mirror 2: Project X, all the pictures are in ultra-high resolution.

data.short_description: This is the Cosplay Album for Mirror 2: Project X. Cosplayed by famous cosers in China.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese, Japanese*, English, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
